items.value: IF (%0 : ran(landing_sequence) or %0 : ran(dragged_airplane)) & zoomLevel >= %0 THEN "visibile" ELSE "hidden" END
IF %0 : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{%0}] /= landing_sequence~[{%0}] THEN 0.4 ELSE 1.0 END
IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(landing_sequence) & zoomLevel >= landing_sequence(AIRPLANES%0) THEN "visibile" ELSE "hidden" END
IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(landing_sequence) THEN 760 - landing_sequence(AIRPLANES%0) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) ELSE 0 END

IF %0 <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) ELSE 0 END

IF %0 <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
IF %0 : blockedTime THEN "yellow" ELSE "#008000" END
IF %0 <= zoomLevel THEN "visibile" ELSE "hidden" END
TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 2
IF %0 : dom(TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) + 1 ELSE 0 END
IF %0 <= zoomLevel THEN "visibile" ELSE "hidden" END
TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 2
IF %0 : dom(TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) + 1 ELSE 0 END
IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) - 20 ELSE 0 END

IF %0 : ran(landing_sequence) THEN
                IF landing_sequence~(%0) : held_airplanes THEN "red"
                ELSIF landing_sequence~(%0) : selectedAirplane THEN "grey"
                ELSE "black"
                END
              ELSIF %0 : ran(dragged_airplane) THEN "white"
              ELSE "black" END
IF %0 : ran(landing_sequence) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END
IF %0 : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{%0}] /= landing_sequence~[{%0}] THEN "white" ELSE "black" END

conc(["300,", INT_TO_STRING(IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) ELSE 0 END), " 325,", INT_TO_STRING(IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) ELSE 0 END + 20), " 325,", INT_TO_STRING(IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) ELSE 0 END - 20)])
IF %0 : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{%0}] /= landing_sequence~[{%0}] THEN "white" ELSE "black" END
IF card(selectedAirplane) = 0 THEN "hidden" ELSE "visible" END
IF card(selectedAirplane) = 0 or #a.(a : held_airplanes & a : selectedAirplane) THEN "hidden" ELSE "visible" END
708 + 40 * (zoomLevel/5 - 3)
IF timeout = TRUE THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
IF clickStartPosition = {} THEN "cursor_1.png" ELSE "cursor_2.png" END

IF block_time_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 210
              ELSIF airplane_pos = currentMousePosition THEN IF dragging_airplane = TRUE THEN 285 ELSE 430 END
              ELSIF hold_button_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 740
              ELSIF zoom_slider_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 713 + 40 * (MU(mousePositionZoomSlider)/5 - 3)
              ELSE 500 END

IF block_time_pos = currentMousePosition THEN
                IF MU(mousePositionBlockSlot) : dom(TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_SLOT_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(MU(mousePositionBlockSlot)) + 1 ELSE 0 END
              ELSIF airplane_pos = currentMousePosition THEN IF MU(mousePositionAirplane) : dom(dragged_airplane) THEN 760 - dragged_airplane(MU(mousePositionAirplane)) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 10 ELSIF MU(mousePositionAirplane) : dom(landing_sequence) THEN 760 - landing_sequence(MU(mousePositionAirplane)) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 10 ELSE 0 END
              ELSIF hold_button_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 510
              ELSIF zoom_slider_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 75
              ELSE 500 END
